TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsSignatureDefinition extends System.Object

span.span: Represents an digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息中的签名定义有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅 10 章中 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 璝惠数字签名，请参阅 MSDN 文章数字签名的 Framework 的在开放式打包约定[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 璝惠[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和设置的属性。The following example shows how to create and set the properties of an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`Intent`元素中的签名定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅中的章节 10[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. value.span: A表示签名者，例如，"Mary Jones，市场营销部门"

span.span: A that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于`SignerName`属性`SignatureDefinition`中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包。This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package. 请注意在名称中的区别。Notice the difference in the names. 有关详细信息`SignerName`属性，请参阅章节 10 的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.

value.span: A ()表示依据签名者必须对包进行签名的截止时间。

span.span: A () that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`SignBy`元素中的签名定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于`SigningLocation`元素中的签名定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包。This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages. 请注意在名称中的区别。Notice the difference in the names. 原始者[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包可以设置此属性。The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property. （可选） 签名者可以在对包签名，如果没有其他人已签署的时间设置属性。Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed. 有关详细信息`SigningLocation`元素，请参阅章 10 中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要链接`Signature`到此元素，必须设置`Id`属性`Signature`为的值属性。To link a `Signature` element to this , you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the property. 有关详细信息`Signature`元素，请参阅[开放式打包约定](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx)架构。For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema. 有关详细信息`SpotID`属性`SignatureDefinition`中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅中的章节 10[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.

span.span: A that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
The default value is .
